body:
Hi,

Thank you for your interest in Oracle ERP Cloud. The links and information that you requested are below/
•         Learn more about ERP Cloud - https://bit.ly/erpmore
•         See what the experts are saying about our ERP strategy by reviewing the latest Analyst Report - https://bit.ly/erparep
•         5 Benefits of Having ERP and HCM in a Single Cloud Platform Whitepaper - https://bit.ly/erpwhp
•         See how other customers have benefited from ERP Cloud - https://bit.ly/erpstories
•         Watch our demos on YouTube - https://bit.ly/erpvideos

Thank you,
Oracle team
